name: Truck Simulator
description:
Truck Simulator is a great app for your action packed driving games. Have you ever wanted to become a real trucker? This is a very interesting job! You need to spend most of your life behind the wheel, leaving your family, friends, cat or dog at home. You can travel to different locations and get unreal emotions! You must complete all tasks in order to successfully carry the load and earn money.
Don't forget to upgrade your car or buy more modern trucks like in other racing games. Choose the best options for yourself!
To safely move a large truck on twisty roads, you need to drive slowly when there is a tight turn ahead.
On the way, you can listen to your favorite music to satisfy your desires and feel great while driving during heavy traffic. Featuring cool trucks with lots of customization, this simulator provides an immersive driving experience that will make you feel like a real trucker! During transport activities you need to cope with realistic missions. There can be a lot of them and there are really difficult ones, but you can handle everything. Your skills will be tested in this game! It's time to war and take part in battle games! With addictive games, you have a chance to become a real driver in the world of trucking.

Luxury FEATURES allow you:
- Drive a realistic truck with different weights and sizes
- Complete exciting missions
- Realistic travel to different cities and countries
- Add and update vehicles
